name: Marble Parkour
description:
Game idea:

Marble Parkour game you need finish different level and collect achievement which is end of levels. Also levels contain save best time system. Player need avoid different traps like exploding mines, bumpers, tornados and moving platforms which could send player out of track. Then player will be respawned to checkpoint. Every level include 2-3 checkpoints.

Features:


- Different Traps: Mines, Tornados, Rotating and disappearing platforms, Bumpers
- Lot of levels and steam achievements
- 9 different ball skins
- Power ups to help with player progress: Super speed, Super jump, Gravity rotater, Ball increaser etc
- Cannos to shoot ball different places
- Different surfaces: Glue, Ice etc
- 17 different skilled levels
- Save best time systems
- Training/Tutorial map
